attributes.action: protect our cultural community library hubs
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want our government to value the uses in our local libraries , by giving a substantial capital investment packages to assist local community libraries to develop into vibrant cultural community library hubs enhancing service delivery of both education and art and culture

In order for our country to remain a viable option from outside investors wishing to create sustainable employment young and older minds need to develop their creative potential our libraries in the heart of our communities are ideal neutral buildings that can extract that passion for learning and development by creating that opportunity ....

Support development of libraries into multi use functional buildings by providing capital investment instead of closing them
